CustomField.formula: IF(LeanData__Target_Object_Type__c == "Lead", LeanData__Lead__c, IF(LeanData__Target_Object_Type__c == "Contact", LeanData__Contact__c, IF(LeanData__Target_Object_Type__c == "Account", LeanData__Account__c, IF(LeanData__Target_Object_Type__c == "Opportunity", LeanData__Opportunity__c, LeanData__Case__c))))
CustomField.label: Target Object Id
